direction.raw_text: - ANGLE - THE SURGICAL APPARATUS Aesculaptor Mark III -- the latest in servo-surgical designs. Completely self-contained -- tilt-bed, cryojector services embedded in the platform. The Mark III's laser heads are integrated into the whole cocoon, swiveled and gimbaled so as to be able to focus any of the surgical beams in microscopic delicacy or wide-bladed scraping. The machine vaguely resembles an enormously complicated x-ray table on an angle -- the great slotted laser heads overhanging it and Integral with it. From the cryonic receptor base there is a steady exhalation of cold -- the vapor seeping steadily downwards, blurring the endlessly looped and tangled tubes and wires and containers Which join in solid state circuitry so that any random or involuntary twitch of a patient will be instantly compensated by an equivalent move of the laser head -- keeping the focus precise. At one end -- where the halves of the Mark III join, is n console of switches and dials -- lights nod servo-recorders which control the operation from the first injection of cold to the final healing vacuum drafts and scar burnishing. With the air of a magician demonstrating, Doc goes to the console and flips switches. Instantly the table responds -- the platform tilting, the crab-like laser arms descending flexing -- small vapor jets oozing as the beams slash harmlessly across the table. Beaming, Doc turns it off and the whole apparatus subsides.

direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Excited....flushed....as: 155

In an instant he has knocked Logan's gun away....and as Logan looks down at it....we see it lying on the floor completely frozen. Slowly, Doc moves toward Logan the short smoke-colored stick menacing in his hand.

dialogue.raw_text: (out-of-breath) What I told you is the.... Abruptly, Doc lunges toward Logan...missing him as Logan ducks away. As Doc turns to attack....Logan smashes his elbows into Doc's chest and Doc falls back onto the Table. 157X1

Holly tries to fight her way into the mess to help Doc, but Jessica, recovering, pulls her down and the two struggle. 157X2

direction.raw_text: Making an effort to stop the machine, pulling levers and pushing buttons in vain. He sees what's happening, pulls Jessica away from Holly and, grabbing up his gun and tunic, heads for the entrance. Crossing the waiting room they are stopped by the sight of: 158- 162XI

direction.raw_text: As they face Francis. 165

direction.raw_text: (frowning) What's going on, Logan?!
direction.name: direction

dialogue.raw_text: It has nothing to do with you.
dialogue.name: dialogue

dialogue.raw_text: (choking but still loyal) What are you talking about?! I saw you let a Runner go? (up a notch) I saw you, Logan?? Tell me!! Suddenly the machine behind them erupts into a great burst of smoke and noise, momentarily drawing Francis' attention. Instantly Logan jumps him, grabs and throws him sprawling. Without a look back, he and Jessica run out. 166
dialogue.name: dialogue

direction.raw_text: Enraged, finds his gun on the floor and, before rising, gets off a shot at them as they disappear. Then leaping to his feet, dashing off in pursuit. 167

direction.raw_text: . - HALLUCIMILL - TWO SHOT - LOGAN AND JESSICA Exiting from the other side...and running through the crowd toward and into a Love Shop...followed by Francis coming out of the Hallucimill, too... and running toward the Love Shop. 175
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: As they enter the hot darkness. The Love Shop is throbbing with sexuality. In it, the darkness breaks at Irregular intervals -- when booths and cubicles flare into brilliance, each time revealing an orgiastic tableau. The Love Shop is multi-leveled and the random flashes may appear from any direction at any time, blinding and stunning the viewer. Logan and Jessica pause to get their bearings and as they do, a beautiful WANTON grabs Logan, pulling and laughing:
direction.name: direction

dialogue.raw_text: I have an empty one, Sandman Logan tries to pull away, looks around for Jessica just in time to see a man almost carrying her off.  Then the light is gone again and Jessica with it. 176
dialogue.name: dialogue

direction.raw_text: As she tears at his clothing, wrapping herself around him, trying to pull him down. Then, as the light flares again she suddenly lets go and grabs another man...Logan is, freed, starts looking for Jessica. 177- 179
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Logan hunting through the Love Shop, fighting them off. INTERCUT SHOTS of the suddenly-illuminated tableaus. Sex, manifold and multiform -- everybody doing it. 180
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Entering, starting to look around -- grabbed by one of the laughing Wantons. 181-182
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Brief glimpses of them looking for each other. 183
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Hunting both. 184
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: As he suddenly collides with a woman -- shoves her away and sees it's Jessica. Now together they make for an archway where multiple mirrors enclose them. Suddenly they are in darkness. Then a heavy door slides open and Jessica leads Logan through the opening. Behind them the door slides shut again. 185
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Desperately trying to get rid of a woman, sees a flash of Logan and Jessica far across the room -sees them leave. Then he's pulled down again as the orgy continues. 186- 186X1
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: . - AN IMMENSE METAL STAIRWAY After a moment, Jessica takes Logan's hand and they start down in the darkness. The SOUNDS of Love Shop still heard from behind the wall.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: (beat) I'd rather take my chances with them...than with Francis.
direction.name: direction

dialogue.raw_text: Are you taking me to them?
dialogue.name: dialogue

dialogue.raw_text: Yes. (beat) I don't know what else to do -- with him following us. (she hesitates) Why do you keep running from your--
dialogue.name: dialogue

dialogue.raw_text: Because he's my friend - (a beat) and I don't want to be killed by him - or anyone.
dialogue.name: dialogue

dialogue.raw_text: He's good, isn't he?
dialogue.name: dialogue

dialogue.raw_text: Will he find us and kill us? Yes...or one of the others. (a beat) You know there's only one place to go now...
dialogue.name: dialogue

dialogue.raw_text: (hopelessly) They won't believe us.
dialogue.name: dialogue

dialogue.raw_text: They won1t listen.
dialogue.name: dialogue

dialogue.raw_text: (interrupting) You think Sandmen will? (before she can answer) There's no other way for me,
dialogue.name: dialogue

dialogue.raw_text: We'll convince them. They pause. He puts his hand over hers. Jessica is silent. Then she turns his hand over. The crystal blinks red -- on, off.
dialogue.name: dialogue

dialogue.raw_text: Yes, Logan. (turning to him blindly) I'm glad they didn't change your face. Logan embraces her, but his look is strange and remote. They continue down into the darkness. Behind them the SOUNDS of Love Shop die away and only their footsteps are heard. 187
dialogue.name: dialogue

direction.raw_text: At the mirrored archway, looking around carefully, testing. He knows they went through somehow. Hands claw at him - he brushes them away as he searches. 188-200
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: They have come to the foot of the stair. Here the flooring shines wetly in the darkness.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: They're watching us now. They'll let us in when they're sure.
direction.name: direction

dialogue.raw_text: (softly) Exactly four steps now. Let me lead you. (they walk) Now to the right. It's narrow here, you'll have to get behind me.
dialogue.name: dialogue

dialogue.raw_text: (whispering) How will they know we're coming?
dialogue.name: dialogue

dialogue.raw_text: (whispering)
dialogue.name: dialogue

direction.raw_text: -UP - LOGAN'S HAND (INSERT) As he fumbles the transceiver switches at his belt, punching out a signal. 200X3
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: .Q. READY ROOM As the Sandmen monitoring SEE THE SIGNAL FLASH and move smoothly into action. 200X4
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Close together, he behind, waiting--alert as a VOICE is suddenly heard:
direction.name: direction

dialogue.raw_text: (scratchy, filtered) Sandman, put your hands on your head. (he does) Clasp your fingers together. Now turn your hands over. Palms up. (beat) In a moment a light will shine in your eyes. Walk into it--Jessica first, then you, Sandman. You will have to stoop--but don't unclasp your hands. Do you agree? Logan nods. Jessica glances back at him but their faces are unreadable in the dark. Then suddenly--in front of her--a blindingly bright, narrow rectangle of light illuminating them fiercely. Jessica moves forward. Even she has to stoop. Logan is close behind. As he bends awkwardly into the opening, the light goes out. 201
dialogue.name: dialogue

direction.raw_text: As he pushes her through the opening then moves instantly to the side, pulling her with him.. The move fails. Both are pinned helplessly in the blinding glare of the spotlight and the sudden appearance of glass-silver spear points pressed against them. Logan is unable to draw his gun.
direction.name: direction

dialogue.raw_text: Hold still, Sandman, or die where you are.
dialogue.name: dialogue

dialogue.raw_text: Is she the one?
dialogue.name: dialogue

dialogue.raw_text: (like angry stage whispers) She betrayed us. Kill him. Kill them both. Jessica you sold us. Sandman butcher. Sandman murderer. Logan and Jessica stand rigid against the spear points, only their heads turning to the echoing sibilants.. The spotlight goes off. 202-204
dialogue.name: dialogue

direction.raw_text: . - SANCTUARY HQ. - LOGAN, JESSICA - CLOSE In the darkness we see the glass-silver spear points are glowing all around them, the long shafts falling away into darkness, the points, steaming gently when they touch--making an instant, wincing burn. Logan moves--a spear point presses--he flinches.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Yes I have. (beat) Now it's my turn. And I want to live. Another angry murmur of VOICES. Over it Jessica suddenly:
direction.name: direction

dialogue.raw_text: I'm a runner. She brought me here because I begged her to help me. He turns his palm. The red crystal blinks impressively in the darkness. At the sight, a BABBLE of SOUNDS. Argument.
dialogue.name: dialogue

dialogue.raw_text: He's lying. No Sandman ever ran.
dialogue.name: dialogue

dialogue.raw_text: You don't run. You kill runners. You have killed runners all your life.
dialogue.name: dialogue

dialogue.raw_text: (shouting) What's the matter with you. He's a runner-- he's blinking. We must help anyone who asks...we must-or we're the same as they are--deciding who lives and dies. One of the points lifts and touches Jessica's cheek. A quick, fierce burn. She shrieks--a tiny sound--and is silent. 206
dialogue.name: dialogue

direction.raw_text: Reacts fiercely, spinning against the spear points, he is Jabbed and pierced in a dozen places as he manages to get Jessica closer, shielding her with his body. But the spear points are too much. He subsides, as VOICES rise angrily "Kill him now". Suddenly a RINGING ALARM. All sound stops at once and we hear a CLATTER of FOOTSTEPS down the iron stair and across the outer floor. The spotlight bursts on again and a figure staggers into the chamber, straightening into the light, hair dishevelled, hands in front against the glare. It's Holly.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: They smashed everything and I barely got away. (beat) Holly. Station 12, Sanctuary 7. Holly. Holly... She lowers her hands and we see her, tattered, frightened--the bright smile strange. She comes to herself a bit, looks to the side and sees Logan and Jessica, pinned against the wall. She reacts with fear at the sight.
direction.name: direction

dialogue.raw_text: Holly. Holly, New You 483... He's dead. Doc's dead and the Sandmen came...
dialogue.name: dialogue

dialogue.raw_text: (gentle) Holly--Holly. Remember the code. The code, please Holly...
dialogue.name: dialogue

dialogue.raw_text: (hysteria)
dialogue.name: dialogue

direction.raw_text: It's him! The first Sandman. He killed...Doc.
direction.name: direction

dialogue.raw_text: No, Holly--wait! He's running. Tell them the rest!
dialogue.name: dialogue

dialogue.raw_text: (suddenly exhausted) He's the one. You too. I remember. He was in a hurry. Just a face job. Dark hair, I said. Then he killed Doc and you grabbed me--and the machine blew up and I ran...I ran
dialogue.name: dialogue

dialogue.raw_text: Holly. Holly! Please...The other Sandman. Remember the one who came after-- Holly suddenly remembers and the shock makes her lucid.
dialogue.name: dialogue

dialogue.raw_text: (pouring it out) That's right. The other one came after. The older one. Smashing, killing, burning!
dialogue.name: dialogue

dialogue.raw_text: (coaching desperately) ...and he was hunting the first one, this one. Wasn't he? Wasn't he? This one was running, the other one was hunting him...
dialogue.name: dialogue

dialogue.raw_text: (remembers) Yes. Oh yes. (to Logan) He was after you. I remember. You're running! 207-208
dialogue.name: dialogue

direction.raw_text: 1 The spear points are withdrawn. Logan and Jessica relieved but shaken, wary.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Other VOICES mumble agreement. Holly moves off into the dark room, hands reaching out to help her.
direction.name: direction

dialogue.raw_text: May we move? A long beat. Then--
dialogue.name: dialogue

dialogue.raw_text: I saw we pass them through. Somebody help Holly.
dialogue.name: dialogue

dialogue.raw_text: You two. Just go straight ahead. Follow the corridors with the pipes overhead to the end. Then use the key. As the voice speaks the spotlight finally goes off and by a dim glow around the perimeter, we see we're in some kind of large underground chamber--some part of the vast undercellars of the city. The light is enough to reveal that there are perhaps twenty people in the room, reds and greens both--but all are silhouetted, no face seen. There's a kind of aisle open down the room's center and it's obviously the way they are to go. Logan and Jessica move off. Logan pauses.
dialogue.name: dialogue

dialogue.raw_text: I don't know who you are. I'd like to thank someone.
dialogue.name: dialogue

dialogue.raw_text: It doesn't matter who we are. Follow the tunnel to the end.
dialogue.name: dialogue

dialogue.raw_text: Will there be someone to tell us where to go from there...? A murmur of discussion then:
dialogue.name: dialogue

dialogue.raw_text: Someone will follow. When you come to the lock, he will tell you how Co go on the other side. Jessica may go with you as far as the lock.
dialogue.name: dialogue

dialogue.raw_text: (a deep breath) No. Jessica goes back now. Take her back. (suddenly his tone is urgent as he speaks to her) Now! Go on back. Back outside, Jessica. She is bewildered by the change.
dialogue.name: dialogue

dialogue.raw_text: Why?- No...no...I'm going with you.
dialogue.name: dialogue

dialogue.raw_text: Only to the lock. After that there's no way back. JESSICA (small voice) I don't care. I'm going to Sanctuary. With you. A BABBLE of VOICES. "Impossible"...She ignores, watches Logan.
dialogue.name: dialogue

dialogue.raw_text: (cont'd) Will you take me with you?
dialogue.name: dialogue

dialogue.raw_text: Why, Jessica? You're still a green. JESSICA shakes her head. She doesn't know why. Logan puts his arm around her, marveling, trying to understand, moved. But suddenly he remembers the urgency of the moment. He wheels, pulling her with him.
dialogue.name: dialogue

dialogue.raw_text: Come on then--they'll be here any minute! Uncomprehending, she starts to run with him. Too late. An EXPLOSION shakes the chamber--the wall bellies inward and a group of Sandmen, led by Francis, burst into the room, firing as they come. Panic. Turmoil. PEOPLE running, SCREAMING--the ALARM BELL RINGING, RINGING as Sandmen methodically slaughter the people in the wreckage of the room. 209
dialogue.name: dialogue

direction.raw_text: As the brief, one-sided battle rages, echoing SHOTS and SCREAMS in the dust filled room, Logan pulls her down out of the way. They watch, helplessly. Suddenly the figure of a Sandman looms before them. He stares at Logan, unsure. Logan reacts, draws, fires. The Sandman is smashed away, burning. 209X2
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Suddenly aware that he has killed a Sandman. Jessica pulls him down again into the shadow. Neither realizes chat the soft pulsing of his crystal can be seen from the room. 210
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Francis, quartering the room like a hound, searching, searching, stopping as he sees 211
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: The crystal blinking red, eerie in the darkness.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: blinking crystal is Jessica's) Logan. I know you're in here. What've you done...gone crazy over a Runner? (whispering) Nobody knows except me. You know I won't say anything. I should have turned you in but I couldn't. Leave her. Come on out with me. It'll look like you're part of the group that hit this nest. (pleading) Logan...you're a Sandman! (slightest beat) Logan...now...now...Logan... After the slightest beat, Logan FIRES and Francis falls, a great chunk of the cave roof falling between him and Logan -- all vision obscured while EXPLOSIONS and SCREAMS continue. 212
direction.name: direction

dialogue.raw_text: (believing the
dialogue.name: dialogue

direction.raw_text: As he pulls her shakily to her feet. She nods, she's okay. He leads her off down the tunnel. 213
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: - TUNNEL following the tracks. The way leads down, curves, recurves, but always down. 214
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: As Logan and Jessica rush toward it. The corridor has widened into a kind of chamber which ends in a great metal door like an immense submarine hatch. The tracks run straight to it and beneath it. The base of the door tands in a couple of inches of water. With great urgency, Logan and Jessica examine the huge door. Logan gives the wheel a tug...nothing. SOUND: A WHIRRING like clockwork...A METALLIC BELL SOUND and then a RECORDED VOICE.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Runner, this is the last gate. Use your key now. When the Bell sounds again...use your key. Good luck, Runner. May you find Sanctuary. SILENCE. Then the BELL CHIME SOUND and a light illumines the center of the wheel where there's a kind of keyhole. The WHIRRING continues for about ten seconds. Then it stops        and the light goes out. 214X1
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Hearing a SOUND they turn and see: 214X2
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: - P.O.V. Far behind them, in the wet glisten of the tunnel, a bobbing light and shadow -- the SOUND of RUNNING 215-216        CLOSE ON - LOGAN AND JESSICA As Jessica takes the ankh from her neck - fumbling with the chain.
direction.name: direction

dialogue.raw_text: (breathlessly) Every key only works once...and only a Lastday key must open this door.... They said it would fit - but.... She tries to fit the ankh into the glowing one, but her hand shakes. Logan tries to steady her - and in helping, she drops it into the dark pool of water. They fall to their knees, searching desperately. Then Logan remembers.
dialogue.name: dialogue

dialogue.raw_text: Wait - I have the one I took from the Runner. SOUND: The same as before as Logan searches his pockets for the Runner's ankh. Logan finds it just as the WHIRRING SOUND has STOPPED again...and the light has gone out again in the center of the wheel. As Logan and Jessica wait for the sound, etcetera to repeat again another TREMENDOUS EXPLOSION is heard rocking everything.  In the distance, Jessica can see the shadow of a FIGURE approaching. As the SOUND, etcetera, repeat-s once more...Logan pushes the ankh into the lighted center of the wheel. The ankh fuses and the lighted center becomes brighter as the door opens. There is a hesitation...in which Logan turning his head back... realizes what he has done and is shaken. As the shadowed FIGURE looms LARGER:
dialogue.name: dialogue

dialogue.raw_text: There's no turning back, is there? Logan turns and pushes Jessica through the door... following her... as the door closes and they are: 217
dialogue.name: dialogue

direction.raw_text: now, they can still hear the SOUND, etcetera for the last time. Beyond the lock is the ruins of a vast undersea complex in which food was raised and harvested. What we see is an endless shadowy labyrinth of breeding pens which stretch off into the green darkness -- a kind of mammoth aquarium with catwalks and ramps intersecting the huge tanks. The levels are multiple and everything is slimed, rusted, rotted and wet. In the tanks themselves are shoals of fish, gardens of seaweed, etc. The machinery for harvesting and winnowing has long since gone to rust -- and visible in the great tanks are the wrecks of vessels and gear -- the kind of stuff Cousteau and Co. are using now. Footing is dangerous -- a slip from any catwalk means a plunge into water and some of the walkways are well under water anyhow. From an invisible ceiling comes a steady dripping and everything is crusted and smells of salt and decay and life in the darkness. 217X1
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: As he arrives at the door, the ankh glowing as before. But Francis has a light. He examines the door with it, and as it lights the pool of water on the ground, it picks out Jessica's ankh. FRANCIS stoops, gets it and looks from it to the one glowing 128
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Bewildered -- uncertain, as their eyes adjust to the dim light. Finally, Logan gestures ''this way" and sets out. (NOTE: The action of the sequence is the action of people groping through a labyrinth. They go along, gripping a rail where possible, sometimes sinking deep into water, sometimes rising above it. They run into blind endings and retrace to the last junction -- always trying for what looks driest and seems to stretch farthest along the great wall...) 219-224
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: - SERIES OF CUTS A. Making their way along the walkway side by side. B. Stopping as the walkway disappears under water. Logan wading in while she waits -- until he re-emerges. She follows. C. Choosing between diverging ramps. Having to return.
direction.name: direction

dialogue.raw_text: How do we know this is the right way?
dialogue.name: dialogue

dialogue.raw_text: It's the only way. D. POV an alley way full of machinery. Logan gives a wheel a half turn -- great rusty net-combs start to winnow the water. E. Helping Jessica, Logan slips...falls into darkness. Jessica's fear until he emerges, hand over slimy hand. The water is cold. F. POV ancient signs - PROTOPLANK...DEPOT NO #11 DO NOT DECANT... HABITAT MARITIME...ETC. They speculate.
dialogue.name: dialogue

dialogue.raw_text: What do you suppose this was...?
dialogue.name: dialogue

dialogue.raw_text: Some kind of breeding pens...I suppose...They say people used to breed animal s, fish, anything (at her disbelieving look) To eat, of course.
dialogue.name: dialogue

dialogue.raw_text: Ycch. (shudders) To kill things and then eat them. It must have been a savage world. Logan shrugs, but the idea makes him queasy, too. G. They stop, tired. Peer through at the wreckage of a small inspection vessel and suddenly hear: SOUND: FOOTSTEPS, coming, halting, WATER sloshing. Steps again. 225
dialogue.name: dialogue

direction.raw_text: - A LIGHT moving, hunting.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Stay here, while I see what it is. Jessica nods, frightened. Logan slips off into the darkness. In a moment he's back. His face - is grim.
direction.name: direction

dialogue.raw_text: (alert)
dialogue.name: dialogue

dialogue.raw_text: It's Francis, isn't it? He nods. 226
dialogue.name: dialogue

direction.raw_text: Trying to move faster now, Logan makes a wrong turning and they must go back. But as they do so, Francis is ever closer -- a gigantic distorted SHAPE now visible through the eerie glass -then suddenly seeming small and distant. As they emerge from the blind alley once again close to the wall, suddenly: 227
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: looming huge, gun drawn, apparently only a few feet away. 228
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Logan desperately claws at machinery, succeeds in starting motion, somewhere what sounds like a GENERATOR begins laboring, ancient machinery GROANS. They turn and run as they HEAR:
direction.name: direction

dialogue.raw_text: (distorted; echo; etcetera)
dialogue.name: dialogue

direction.raw_text: is splashing the walls ahead and in it they suddenly see: THE DOOR -- a waterlock with a wheel. As the light passes, Logan heaves desperately on it. It starts to give as the light comes back and they are revealed. 230
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: aiming at Logan...then slowly moving his hand until Jessica is in his sights. 231
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: - JESSICA - FRANCIS Francis FIRES -- tremendous SOUND, ECHOING and RESOUNDING. One of the great tanks buckles and a cascade of water erupts over everything. Through it, Logan manages to get the door open and pushes a half-drowning Jessica through. 232
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: A sort of ancient freight elevator which commences to move groaning when the waterlock door closes. Logan slumps to the floor. 233
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Moving at an extremely high speed...We can see the outside - flickering - dark, light, - dark, light... and finally to a white color. They lie slumped, motionless. Finally it stops. The door opens into a kind of glistening darkness, suffused by a bluish glow. It is now very cold. In the silence Logan stirs. Groping, he touches Jessica, who moves close to him. Logan puts his arm around her and they rise. Slowly, tentatively, he leads her out into the dark chamber where they stand for a moment trying to find themselves. What little light there is seems to come from the left. Arm around Jessica, Logan starts to move.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: It's brighter there...besides, we can't go back. He starts to move again but Jessica hangs back.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: I don't know what's going to happen to us Logan but -- (a beat) Are you glad you didn't kill him?
direction.name: direction

dialogue.raw_text: (whispering) I'm afraid.
dialogue.name: dialogue

dialogue.raw_text: Wait. He halts.
dialogue.name: dialogue

dialogue.raw_text: (cont'd)
dialogue.name: dialogue

dialogue.raw_text: It doesn't make any difference anymore.
dialogue.name: dialogue

dialogue.raw_text: You're really one of us now, aren't you?
dialogue.name: dialogue

dialogue.raw_text: You knew that I wasn't before, didn't you? (Jessica nods) Why did you stay with me?
dialogue.name: dialogue

dialogue.raw_text: (feelingly) I wanted to... (Logan puts his arms around her) ...And you...what made you kill Sandmen?
dialogue.name: dialogue

dialogue.raw_text: I had to. I did kill...for the first time in my life I killed.
dialogue.name: dialogue

dialogue.raw_text: Because you felt like a Runner, didn't you.
dialogue.name: dialogue

dialogue.raw_text: I guess so...I know I felt something I never felt before...and I didn't like it...not a bit. (after another long beat) I'll tell you one thing...Sanctuary better be worth it. That's the last place for me to live now.
dialogue.name: dialogue

dialogue.raw_text: For us. Logan mouths "Us"...a strange word...and why not... in the last minutes he has done strange things. 234-236
dialogue.name: dialogue

direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: IC MONTAGE SERIES OF CUTS A. EXT. The City under the dome -- fitfully lit as the dome itself seems to be cracking strange electrical discharges emanating from it as from a gigantic line storm. B. The lights in Arcade flicker and go dim. C. The chandeliers in Arcade swaying, a couple falling onto the screaming panicky people. D. Maze-Car Station. People fighting to cram into cars. Car lights go out. People turn and bolt in another direction. E. Love Shop -- pandemonium as the drugged bodies clamber over each other in fear, struggling to get away. F. Great Hall emptying -- the signs of panic everywhere. G. The great crystal -- a wildly spluttering electrical fire wrecking it. 410X22
direction.name: direction
